text: Ezɨ dughiar mamɨn gɨn, gumazir man Balsalisan nguibam ategha, Elisa bagha ize. Kar bali aghoramin dughiam. Gumazir kam uan azenimɨn, balin faragha aniba aghoregha, 20plan balin bretɨn rubuzir tueziba ko balin tuezir puvatɨzir maba sara inigha uan mɨtarim gaghuigha, da inigha Elisa bagha ize. Ezɨ Elisa uan ingangarir gumazim mɨgɨa ghaze, “Nɨ dagher kaba isɨ akam inigha izir gumazibar anɨngtɨ, me dar amɨ.”
